"About Grinding Attributes in NT Weapons:
"New-Type weapons have \"Attribute\" and \"Attribute Value.\"

\"Attribute\" refers to your weapon's elemental type.
\"Attribute Value\" refers to the elemental value percentage of your weapon."
"To increase the Attribute Value, you will need to use a weapon of the <yellow>same rarity and type<c> as material when grinding the weapon."

"If the material weapon has the same name as the target weapon, the attribute value will increase significantly.

※If they have the same name and the same attribute, it will increase even further.

Normal attribute values are capped at 50, but weapons and Pets that are rarity ★13 or higher have a maximum attribute value of 60."

"The higher the attribute, the more damage you deal to the enemy.

Furthermore, damage that matches an enemy's attribute weakness will result in even greater damage!

The attribute is determined when you obtain a weapon, but can be changed later with support items."
